title: Non-geodesic timelike observers and the ultralocal limit
authors: Reza Saadati, Luca Valsan and Valerio Faraoni
abstract:
The ultralocal limit along timelike geodesics, in which any geometry reduces
to Bianchi I, does not extend to non-geodesic timelike observers. Exceptions
are discussed, including particles with variable mass, test particles in
Einstein frame scalar-tensor gravity, and self-interacting dark matter.
